DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate telmisartan 80mg least effective possibly superior ramipril 5mg & 10mg lower mean ambulatory DBP SBP last 6 hrs 24-hr dose interval mild-to-moderate hypertensive end 8 14 week treatment phase .
DOC.brief_title: PROBE Investigation Safety & Efficacy Telmisartan ( Micardis® ) v Ramipril ( Altace® ) Using ABPM HTN
